messages.content: Like many in our community, I was devastated by the vote for the UK to leave the European Union.
Now more than ever we need a local champion who can and will stand up for us on all the local and national issues which will matter to the future of us all.

P.S. This year we have a chance to bring back the sort of MP our area deserves and to vote for a party that will be a strong opposition to the Tories. But we can only do so if you vote for me on your ballot paper.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fought across party lines for a Remain vote and calls for giving the people the final say on the Brexit deal.
Led campaigns on these issues, highlighting them as priorities for representation.

mentions.tacticalSituation: This year we have a chance to bring back the sort of MP our area deserves and to vote for a party that will be a strong opposition to the Tories. But we can only do so if you vote for me on your ballot paper.

issues.brexitEurope: I fought across party lines for a Remain vote in the referendum last year. Since then, I have been shocked that Jeremy Corbyn’s Labour Party have failed to stand up to Theresa May’s disastrous Brexit.
issues.education: As your MP, I helped tens of thousands of local people. I led campaigns on housing, schools and health.
issues.health: As your MP, I helped tens of thousands of local people. I led campaigns on housing, schools and health.

leaflet.personalStatement: As a proud European, who studied at the College of Europe and worked in European and human rights law in Brussels and Strasbourg and here in London, I fought across party lines for a Remain vote in the referendum last year. Since then, I have been shocked that Jeremy Corbyn’s Labour Party have failed to stand up to Theresa May’s disastrous Brexit.

politicalExperience.achievements: Helped tens of thousands of local people. Led campaigns on housing, schools, and health. Proud of record in domestic and foreign affairs.

Now more than ever we need a local champion who can and will stand up for us on all the local and national issues which will matter to the future of us all.

This year we have a chance to bring back the sort of MP our area deserves and to vote for a party that will be a strong opposition to the Tories. But we can only do so if you vote for me on your ballot paper.
